scripts.e2e-fullregression-local-chrome: npm run clean-reports && BROWSER=chrome ENV=local HEADLESS=false cucumber-js --tags '@FullRegression'
scripts.e2e-fullregression-local-chrome-headless: npm run clean-reports && BROWSER=chrome ENV=local HEADLESS=true cucumber-js --tags '@FullRegression'
scripts.e2e-rerun-chrome: npm run clean-reports && BROWSER=chrome ENV=local cucumber-js -p rerun test-results/rerun/@rerun.txt
scripts.e2e-rerun-firefox: npm run clean-reports && BROWSER=chrome ENV=local cucumber-js -p rerun test-results/rerun/@rerun.txt
scripts.e2e-smoketest-local-firefox: npm run clean-reports && BROWSER=firefox ENV=local cucumber-js --tags '@Smoke'
scripts.e2e-smoke-local-firefox: npm run start & npm run e2e-smoke-local-firefox
scripts.e2e-fullregression-runner-test: npm run clean-reports && ENV=local npx playwright test --config=playwright.config.ts --grep=@FullRegression
